name: Three switches and a washer in Space
name_original: Three switches and a washer in Space
description:
[note: I have no idea if the mac and linux versions are actually working. They also look a bit different, because I never bothered updating them...]

The first game I ever made.

Move around with WASD, jump with Space, run with shift, look around with your mouse.

It actually tries to demonstrate something very interesting. However I can't tell you what it's about, since it would make playing the game obsolete. Feel free to get in touch with me, if you want to know more.

Music:

'Kool Kats' by Kevin MacCleod

http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.ht...

Soundeffects:

Noisy Crips by chilled35

http://www.freesound.org/people/chilled35/sounds/1...

Ding Ding Small Bell by JohnsonBrandEditing

http://www.freesound.org/people/JohnsonBrandEditin...
